Initializer# init(parentImage:sliceRange:featureChannels:)

iOS 10.0+iPadOS 10.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.13+tvOS 10.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
init(
    parentImage parent: MPSImage,
    sliceRange: NSRange,
    featureChannels: Int
)
```
